channel.title: atom/book on/mindset on
channel.description: Recent content in atom/book on/mindset on

item.title: niagara syndrome
item.description: if life is a river, people jump into it headfirst without knowing exactly where to go and what to do. so they get caught up in the “current” — current events, current fears, current challenges. tao-te-ching we are out of our control — everything else controls us solution: direct yourself by making a decision decisions-determine-destiny
